about_the_game:
Synchro Bright Future is a challenging roguelike turn-based RPG about the ascent of a person in inhuman conditions.

You are a young resistance leader whose parents were killed by covetous technocrats. Recruit and lead ordinary people, in whom true heroes lie dormant. Explore shady corners of a huge city of Solar-30 and fight androids, the mafia, and robotic abominations in unique synchronous combat system. Unravel your family drama and uncover the mystery of enigmatic living plastic experiments conducted by corporations.

Will the resistance be able to overcome internal conflicts and thwart the corporations' plans to establish total control over human?

GAME FEATURES

- Unique setting of a Eurasian techno-dystopia on the verge of cyberpunk, imbued with a dark 2.5D comic book style;

- New synchronous turn-based combat system - anticipate enemy movements to survive;

- Procedurally generated Solar-30 districts with tense gameplay and a top-down vertical perspective;

- Secret hideout in one of the city skyscrapers - a place for rest and character development;

- Synchronous leveling system - balance the development of not only the physical and mental but also the spiritual qualities of your fighters;

- Ascend together with comrades, reading short but profound fragments from world literature classics;

- Hardcore and dramatic rules with permanent death and inevitable world reaction to your actions.

PSYCHOLOGICAL TRAUMAS

Uncontrolled technologies sow madness and chaos... To understand this world and deal with the mental traumas of your fighters, a professional psychologist - one of the resistance founders, will help. Fight the demons in your comrades' minds and assist in instilling them with useful life values that affect gameplay.

COMBAT SYSTEM

The unique synchronous turn-based combat system provides unconventional experience while retaining all the advantages of classic turn-based combat. A full-fledged two-dimensional combat space without a grid ensures combat diversity, microcontrol, and gameplay depth. All of this, multiplied by dozens of diverse enemies and unique locations - each with its tactical peculiarities - provides over 20 hours of substantive gameplay.

WORLD CLASSICS

"What matters is not the quantity of knowledge but its quality. One can know a great many things without knowing what is truly necessary"

In a struggle, one always needs something to rely upon. In the Library, fighters immerse themselves in the eternal ideas of timeless world literature classics. This way, you can develop their Awareness and unlock new topics for discussion with the psychologist. It will help to understand yourself better and grasp the true meaning of what is happening in the city of Solar-30.

TEAM

Recruit fighters through an extensive agent network. Develop their equipment in the workshop and modify their skills to create your own unique combinations of characters and abilities. This way, you can thoroughly prepare for each challenge that awaits Aurora.

What can you oppose to the power of the enemy's technological progress? The strength of the human spirit against the lies and hypocrisy of corporations! Freedom against oppression!

The time for making choices has passed, it's time to act!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 (dual-core) / AMD® Phenom™ II X4 965 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTS 450 (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7750 (1 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-8320 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 (4 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 290X (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
